title: Acces to raw wifi,bt and cellular data
body: Allow access to raw data such as signal strength imformation to allow creation of indoor location positioning using available wifi, bluetooth or cellular networks when no gps data is available.

comments.body: Having that information is very important for indoor localization.

I also will have an app which I had on Android two years before:
WIFI Analyzer
I would like to have this also to have the capability of the android gsm monitor app
I would like to see this added because I have an app in mind that I want to developed that requires me to access the signal strength.
